channel.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
channel.description:
For those of you that might have missed these, here are a couple of mods that really amps up the look of Doom 3. Both of these include other popular mods that focus on improving graphical fidelity. There are also some gameplay options provided by the Sikkmod component.
Doom 3 Absolute HD v1.5, released October 15/13
[url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/absolutehd/downloads/doom-3-absolute-hd']https://www.moddb.com/mods/absolutehd/downloads/doom-3-absolute-hd[/url]
Doom 3 - RoE Absolute HD v1.1, released August 11/14
[url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/absolutehd/downloads/doom-3-roe-absolute-hd-11']https://www.moddb.com/mods/absolutehd/downloads/doom-3-roe-absolute-hd-11[/url]
Doom 3 is even more visually stunning with these installed. If your system has the horsepower, check them out.
=========================================================================
For You Doom 3 Lovers II
A group of individuals over at IO Doom 3 [url='https://www.iodoom3.org/']https://www.iodoom3.org/[/url] have been tweaking the hell (get it) out of the Doom 3 source code that id Software released on November 22, 2011, in order to squeeze and wring out as much performance as possible out the id Tech 4 engine.
Their FAQ states "This project aims to build upon that source code release by cleaning up, fixing bugs, and adding features. Our permanent goal is to create the open-source Doom 3 distribution upon which people base their games and projects. We also seek to have the perfect version of the game engine for playing Doom 3, it’s expansion pack Resurrection of Evil, and all popular mods."
Although they state that they have yet to release their mod, I came across a supposed release of IO Doom 3 on the Moddb website [url='https://www.moddb.com/games/doom-iii/downloads/iodoom3']https://www.moddb.com/games/doom-iii/downloads/iodoom3[/url]
If you're interested, try it out and see what kind of improvements/mileage you get. Remember to backup your original file(s)!

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: The_Scientist
item.description:
Flatline:

Was there anyone that loved Doom 3? Awful, awful game. Everything looked plastic, I was always getting lost because every level was identical. And I, bad FPSer that I am beat the final boss on normal difficulty on the first attempt. Even the movie was better.

Sweeping statements aside, Doom 3 was a superb showcase for what the tech could do at the time and i remember when I first fired it up, it looked the mutts nuts and still stands up today.
The film was truly abysmal and I’d take the game any day.

Read full topic

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: SHREDDER
item.description:
i also have the crash problem in Absolute doom 31.6 at radio check. Any fix? My pc is core i5 2500k 3,3ghz 12 gb ddr 3 1600 mhz gigabyte gtx 970 g1 gaming. I have all setting maxed 1920x1080. I see some people mentioned that wre must restart it. But how? What to do exaxtly? I typed kill in console(commit suicide) then i clicked restart from the optiomns the game have me but again it crashed at radio check,

Read full topic

item.description:
Game crashes when security boy does the radio check.

Well I got past that by restarting but now it crashes after I get up a ladder in a bathroom in level 6. Fucking hell.

item.description:
pfannkuchen_gesicht:

sso when I try to download the first file it says “page not found” on filefront.

Anyway, another thing. Is it possible that Sikkmod is broken on AMD cards? Because the other day I tried it everything looked distorted and corrupted.

  1. Just tried both file links and they are both working. Try again.

  2. I think I remember reading about Sikkmod having some troubles with AMD cards. Read the “Comments” section here https://www.moddb.com/mods/sikkmod or do some Googling.

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
The can:

Do you have Winrar? Cause it would be strange if your Winrar only opens .zip and not .rar :3

Oddly enough, I was having problems opening other downloaded files. Couldn’t open .7z or .rar files, unless I changed their extensions to .zip.

I eventually fixed my problems by re-installing WinRAR.

SHEESH ![/SIZE]

Read full topic

EDIT: Never mind, I was able to open the file by changing the file extension to .zip

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
I guess I stress too much over real life, so there’s no more space for further stress of any kind and I don’t know how to chill, since I don’t do drugs nor I party or drink often, so there’s no way to regulate the stress.

Like it’s amusing, when I played Doom 3 as a kid, I barely got scared but I tried playing it again a few years ago and I couldn’t do more than 10 steps in one session before shutting the game off.

Paradoxically, when I was a kid, I actually feared whole lots more of shit, like darkness and I used to be very superstitious and delusional, yet the game didn’t scare me.

So I suppose I now actually don’t fear the contents of horror games themselves, but I have fear of getting scared (weird, but it exists I guess), so I’m convincing myself that I will get scared, even though I likely wouldn’t.

Crazy psychological shit.

Read full topic

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Dotard:

There’s audience for everything. I for one like the game a lot, the only reason I don’t play it anymore is because I become more easily stressed than when I was younger and I don’t want to risk a heart attack or something.

How is that even possible, I mean it’s probably not you, it’s that the problems you have to deal with usually get replaced with bigger problems as you get older, so I always thought that I become much less easily stressed as I get older, otherwise I’d be dead already.

Read full topic

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: The_can
item.description:
Dadster:

@ The can

Your effects/sounds are great, and I’m familiar with Phrozo’s great particles work. I’m very interested in getting my hands on your mod.

Please upload when it’s complete and you have the time.

PS. Fraggin’ a Fatty never gets old.

If you already have sikkmod installed, here’s just the sounds and particles:

https://www.mediafire.com/?20l1jl7nsqw2u23 (drop it in the sikkmod folder)

Or you can just download my entire mod folder and you’ll have everything (sikkmod, wulfen textures etc):

https://www.mediafire.com/download/csr3htczm082237/sikkmod_janitor.rar (drop the sikkmod folder in the doom 3 folder)

Also don’t put the ingame audio slider to max, it might mess up the sound levels so keep it a little below max like so:

Read full topic

item.title: For You Doom 3 Lovers
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Flatline:

Was there anyone that loved Doom 3? Awful, awful game. Everything looked plastic, I was always getting lost because every level was identical. And I, bad FPSer that I am beat the final boss on normal difficulty on the first attempt. Even the movie was better.

Awful to me seems a bit much. It was maybe an awful “Doom” game when compared to what Doom was or what id had been doing but on its own merits it was hardly an awful game.

Read full topic
